Workshops

We organize a road-show of hands-on informal and interactive three-day workshops across the Nordics with type-along type of presentations, live coding and demos. Short tutorials alternate with practical exercises. If you are interested in these workshops, please get in touch!

Scheduled workshops

  • Umeå, May 29, 2017

Planned workshops

  • Jun 2017 - Tromsø
  • Oct 2017 - Aarhus
  • Nov 2017 - Linköping
  • Dec 2017 - Helsinki
  • Feb 2018 - Trondheim
  • Mar 2018 - Turku
  • Apr 2018 - Odense
  • May 2018 - Uppsala
  • Jun 2018 - Oslo

Past workshops

About

Dellingr is a project within the Nordic e-Infrastructure Collaboration (NeIC). NeIC is an organisational unit under NordForsk.
